channel.title: A Set Of Certain Musings
channel.description: A set of musings about coding, computers, and perhaps some other things...

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello. I see you’ve managed to stumble upon my first post here. Honestly, I just wanted to get something out. Jekyll seems to be a sufficiently complex tool and, like most times I have my first experience. I suppose I expect most folks that due this sort of thing are domain experts, or at least think they are. Suffice to say, I am not. Mostly I just see some bit of new technology or new idea and seek to gorge myself on the documentation, try a few things out, and then just move on…like a buffet. So in the interest of keeping this a correct introduction here is the proverbial hello world. 

let () = print_endline "Hello, world!"

At any rate, one thing I’ve been looking at recently has been Mirage and learning about how to setup a unikernel to run on a Xen instance in the cloud. If you see this, than I was probably successful and I’ll do a follow up post with my experience. Otherwise, it probably won’t matter much what I’ve said here anyway.
